Texts.Chs: 把^orange;高级基因提取器^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Advanced Xenolab^reset; to ^green;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 你相信科学吗？我对此表示怀疑，如果你打算证明我说错的话，那就建造出^orange;高级基因提取器^reset;吧！
Texts.Eng: Can you out-science me? I doubt it. If you think you can, prove it by bringing me a ^orange;completed Advanced Xeno Lab^reset;!

Texts.Chs: 嗯。我想这样就解决了。既然你光明正大的击败了我，这张科技卡就给你了。
Texts.Eng: Well...I guess that settles it. I suck. Since you bested me fair and square, have these tech cards
